slogan: Build your Svelte landing page effortlessly with the required sections to your project.
meText: I developed this website as a template for future projects, providing a flexible and efficient starting point.
featuresDescriptionSmall: Enjoy a seamless experience with our platform's customizable features: easily toggle between dark and light mode, access multiple languages for global support, and benefit from responsive UI design.
aboutDescription: Svelte-Stack is a comprehensive template crafted to streamline your Svelte development experience. It provides a solid foundation, equipped with a wide array of pre-configured features and components. This allows developers to rapidly build and scale applications with ease. Whether you're developing a small project or a large-scale application, Svelte-Stack ensures that your codebase remains clean, maintainable, and efficient.
conceptsDescription: Svelte-Stack brings together all the essential tools and features you need to turn your ideas into reality. Manage your concepts seamlessly in one integrated interface.
testimonial1: Svelte-Stack makes my development process smooth and efficient. Highly recommended!
testimonial2: I love the built-in features of Svelte-Stack. It saves me so much time setting up projects.
testimonial3: Svelte-Stack's theme switching is a game-changer for developing modern, responsive apps.
testimonial4: The integration with Drizzle ORM makes database management so much easier and intuitive.
testimonial5: Svelte-Stack's authentication system is top-notch, providing both security and ease of use.
testimonial6: Building scalable apps has never been easier thanks to Svelte-Stack's architecture.
testimonialDescription: See what developers are saying about their experience with Svelte-Stack.
faqAnswer1: Yes. It is a free Svelte-Stack template.
faqQuestion2: How can I contribute to the project?
faqAnswer2: You can contribute by forking the repository, making changes in a new branch, and creating a pull request with a detailed description of your changes.
faqQuestion3: What are the system requirements for running Svelte-Stack?
faqAnswer3: You need NodeJS or Bun installed on your system. The project is compatible with most modern browsers.
faqQuestion4: How can I add new features to the template?
faqAnswer4: To add new features, you can modify the code directly in the repository, then test your changes locally. Once you're satisfied, commit the changes and push them to your fork. You can then create a pull request for your additions.
faqQuestion5: Can I use Svelte-Stack for commercial projects?
faqAnswer5: Yes, you can use Svelte-Stack for commercial projects. The project is licensed under the MIT License, which allows for both personal and commercial use. However, please note that Svelte-Stack uses several third-party modules, each of which may have its own license. Be sure to review the licenses of these third-party packages for any additional restrictions.
accessibilityDescription: Svelte-Stack ensures that your applications are accessible to all users, following the best practices in web accessibility.
performanceDescription: Experience lightning-fast development and runtime performance with Svelte-Stack, powered by Bun for superior speed and efficiency.
securityDescription: Svelte-Stack prioritizes security with features like Argon2 password hashing and rate limiting, ensuring your applications are safe from threats.
customizationDescription: With Svelte-Stack, you have the freedom to customize and extend features to fit your project's unique needs.
howItWorksDescription: Follow our simple guide to get started with Svelte-Stack and take full advantage of its powerful features.
cloneRepositoryDescription: Run the command `git clone https://github.com/timootten/Svelte-Stack.git` to clone the repository to your local machine.
installDependenciesDescription: Use the command `bun install` to install all necessary dependencies for the project.
runDevelopmentServerDescription: Start the development server by executing `bun run dev` and view your application in the browser.
viewApplicationDescription: Open your browser and navigate to http://localhost:5173 to see the Svelte-Stack application in action.
newsletterDescription: Subscribe to get the latest news and updates.
pricingDescription: Choose the plan that best suits your needs and start enjoying our services today.
freePlanDescription: Always free under the MIT license, ensuring you have unrestricted access to all features without any cost.
sponsorPlanDescription: Support the project and get better support for your questions.
sponsorPlusPlanDescription: Get premium support and contribute significantly to the project.
servicesDescription: Svelte-Stack provides a comprehensive set of features designed to streamline development and enhance user experience.
multipleLanguagesSupportDescription: Built-in internationalization (i18n) capabilities for creating multi-language applications easily.
themeSwitchingDescription: Users can toggle between dark and light themes effortlessly, enhancing user experience across different environments.
authenticationSystemDescription: A full-fledged authentication system powered by Lucia, providing secure user management.
teamDescription: Meet our dedicated team of professionals who are committed to delivering excellence and innovation in every project.
noTeamMemberAssigned: No team member assigned to this position yet.
